info.title: Infisical API
info.description: List of all available APIs that can be consumed

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of versions to return

post.summary: Roll back secret to a version.
post.description: Roll back secret to a version.

version.description: Version of secret to roll back to

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of secret snapshots to skip

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of secret snapshots to return

post.summary: Roll back project secrets to those captured in a secret snapshot version.
post.description: Roll back project secrets to those captured in a secret snapshot version.

version.description: Version of secret snapshot to roll back to

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of logs to return

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Order to sort the logs by

post.description: Create a new folder in a specified workspace and environment

400.description: Bad Request. For example, 'Folder name cannot contain spaces. Only underscore and dashes'

401.description: Unauthorized request. For example, 'Folder Permission Denied'

workspaceId.description: ID of the workspace where the folder will be created

environment.description: Environment where the folder will reside

folderName.description: Name of the folder to be created

parentFolderId.description: ID of the parent folder under which this folder will be created. If not specified, it will be created at the root level.

get.summary: Retrieve folders based on specific conditions
get.description: Fetches folders from the specified workspace and environment, optionally providing either a parentFolderId or a parentFolderPath to narrow down results

parameters.name: workspaceId
parameters.description: ID of the workspace from which the folders are to be fetched

parameters.name: environment
parameters.description: Environment where the folder is located

parameters.name: parentFolderPath
parameters.description: Path of the parent folder, like /folder1/folder2

400.description: Bad Request. For instance, 'The folder doesn't exist'

401.description: Unauthorized request. For example, 'Folder Permission Denied'

patch.description: Update the name of a folder in a specified workspace and environment by its ID

parameters.name: folderId
parameters.description: ID of the folder to be updated

400.description: Bad Request. Reasons can include 'The folder doesn't exist' or 'Folder name cannot contain spaces. Only underscore and dashes'

401.description: Unauthorized request. For example, 'Folder Permission Denied'

workspaceId.description: ID of the workspace where the folder is located

environment.description: Environment where the folder is located

delete.description: Delete the specified folder from a specified workspace and environment using its ID

parameters.name: folderId
parameters.description: ID of the folder to be deleted

folders.description: List of IDs and names of the deleted folders

400.description: Bad Request. Reasons can include 'The folder doesn't exist'

401.description: Unauthorized request. For example, 'Folder Permission Denied'

workspaceId.description: ID of the workspace where the folder is located

environment.description: Environment where the folder is located

post.description: Create a new secret import for a specified workspace and environment

400.description: Bad Request. For example, 'Secret import already exist'

401.description: Unauthorized request. For example, 'Folder Permission Denied'

404.description: Resource Not Found. For example, 'Failed to find folder'

workspaceId.description: ID of the workspace where the secret import will be created

folderId.description: Folder ID. Use root for the root folder.

get.description: Fetches the secret imports based on the workspaceId, environment, and folderId

parameters.name: workspaceId
parameters.description: ID of the workspace of secret imports to get

parameters.name: environment
parameters.description: Environment of secret imports to get

parameters.name: folderId
parameters.description: ID of the folder containing the secret imports. Default: root

401.description: Unauthorized access due to invalid token or scope

403.description: Forbidden access due to insufficient permissions

put.description: Updates an existing secret import based on the provided ID and new import details

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the secret import to be updated

401.description: Unauthorized access due to invalid token or scope

403.description: Forbidden access due to insufficient permissions

get.summary: Retrieve the current user on the request
get.description: Retrieve the current user on the request

get.summary: Return organizations that current user is part of
get.description: Return organizations that current user is part of

organizations.description: Organizations that user is part of

parameters.name: membershipId
parameters.description: ID of organization membership to update

role.description: Role of organization membership - either owner, admin, or member

parameters.name: membershipId
parameters.description: ID of organization membership to delete

get.summary: Return projects in organization that user is part of
get.description: Return projects in organization that user is part of

schema.description: Response after creating a new environment

put.description: Rename a specific environment within a workspace

oldEnvironmentSlug.description: Current slug of the environment to rename

delete.description: Delete a specific environment from a workspace

schema.description: Response after deleting an environment from a workspace

environmentSlug.description: Slug of the environment to delete

get.summary: Get all accessible environments of a workspace
get.description: Fetch all environments that the user has access to in a specified workspace

schema.description: List of environments the user has access to in the specified workspace
Encrypted project key for the given project

parameters.name: membershipId
parameters.description: ID of project membership to update

role.description: Role of membership - either admin or member

parameters.name: membershipId
parameters.description: ID of project membership to delete

post.description: Create one or many secrets for a given project and environment.

secrets.description: Newly-created secrets for the given project and environment
Secret(s) to create - object or array of objects

get.description: Read secrets from a project and environment

secrets.description: Secrets for the given project and environment
Secret(s) to update - object or array of objects

delete.description: Delete one or many secrets by their ID(s)

secretIds.description: ID(s) of secrets - string or array of strings

bearerAuth.description: This security definition uses the HTTP 'bearer' scheme, which allows the client to authenticate using a JSON Web Token (JWT) that is passed in the Authorization header of the request.

apiKeyAuth.name: X-API-Key
apiKeyAuth.description: This security definition uses an API key, which is passed in the header of the request as the value of the "X-API-Key" header. The client must provide a valid key in order to access the API.
